hodanna giya "kiyala puka gana hadapu kathawak matath mathak wunaonna eka manussayek hitiyalu miniha harima duppath.kochchara duppathda kiyanawanam hariyata kanna adinna wath naha.ee madiwata kath kawuruwathma nathilu.ithin miniha dawasak dewiyanta mehema kiyanawalu "ane dewiyane thamunnanseta mawa pennema nadda?mechchara duk widina mama gana kisima anukampawak dukak danilama nadda?"onna oya widiyata miniha dewiyanta duka kiyala adanna gaththalu.menna bole dewiyanta duka hithila miniha lagata aawalu"ha..ha..ookata ithin ochchara nahen adanna oone naha.menna me guli thuna aragena thamanta oona deyak hithala udadanawa.habayi ithin eka guliyakin eka warayayi.hodata kalpana karala wara thuna illanawa" ehema kiyala dewiya minihage athata guli thunak dila nopeni giyalu.
